TEXT.TITLE: AGENCY RENT-A-CAR <AGNC> SETS STOCK DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Agency Rent-A-Car Inc said its board declared a five pct stock dividend, payable May 22 to holders of record on May 8. The company also said it plans to increase the size of its rental fleet in the year ending January 31 by 20 to 25 pct and expand its rental office network. Reuter
